Kindly Care | SF, NY, LA, San Diego, Dallas, Houston | City Manager | $100k + equity

Kindly Care (https://www.kindlycare.com) helps families find, hire, and manage private caregivers so that their elderly loved ones can age in their homes rather having to move into assisted living facilities. We closed a Series A earlier this year, and have raised over $10m to date. To find out more about Kindly Care, check out our Techcrunch coverage: https://goo.gl/1S6uCD

We are looking to hire city managers in SF, NY, LA, San Diego, Dallas, and Houston. Our city managers oversee our daily operations in their cities, help us build relationships with our local clients and caregivers, and organize community building events.

If you'd like to learn more, let's get in touch! I am Igor and you can reach me at hr@kindlycare.com.
